item.title: First Steps into a Bright New World
item.description: A Hopeful Intro in a Dim World One man on a simple mission: to find his path forward and out of the Air Capital and into a tech-filled world. Hello World, my name is Mick. I’m a 30 year old and have a simple, yet grandiose dream: get my FOSS-loving self a job in tech. A Little About Me I have been grinding out non-career jobs for over a decade and went to school for Information Technology.
